//Function used to retrieve an item from the local users broswer storage
export function getFromStorage(key){if(!key){return null;}try{var valueStr=localStorage.getItem(key);if(valueStr){return JSON.parse(valueStr);}return null;}catch(err){return null;}}export function setInStorage(key,obj){if(!key){console.error("Error: Key is missing");}try{localStorage.setItem(key,JSON.stringify(obj));}catch(err){console.error(err);}}
